game.name: Void Reforest
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Stereo Sound, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 거의 모든 기술이 의식을 갖고 통제권을 장악한 2.5D 퍼즐 플랫폼 게임입니다. 당신은 로봇을 조종해 포스트아포칼립스 미래에서 네오-픽션 환경을 탐험하며 마지막 생존 희망을 찾아 나섭니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A 2.5D puzzle-platformer where almost all technology has gained consciousness and taken control. You play as a robot in a post-apocalyptic future, exploring neo-fictional environments in search of the last hope for survival.
